sentences.sContent: How do you sharpen your ax?

sentences.sCn: 他再次挥舞了他的斧头。

sentences.sContent: I said it was all well and good to let them strike the first blow, but if they hit us hard below the belt, we should take a meat ax and cut their hands off.
sentences.sContent_eng: I said it was all well and good to let them strike the first blow, but if they hit us hard below the belt, we should take a meat ax and cut their hands off.
sentences.sCn: 我说，我们容忍共和党人先出手，向我们发动攻击，这也就罢了，但如果他们不正当地抨击我们的要害部位，我们就应该拿起一把剁肉的斧头，将他们的手砍断。

remMethod.val: 形似一个健壮的樵夫身背两把交叉的斧子
